text: Tuba City is an unincorporated town in Coconino County, Arizona, on Navajo lands, in the United States. It is the second-largest community in Coconino County. The population of the census-designated place (CDP) was 8,072 at the 2020 census. It is the Navajo Nation's largest community, slightly larger than Shiprock, New Mexico. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Arizona Category:Unincorporated communities in Arizona
title: Tuba City, Arizona
